CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Flash Newspicture Magazine, December 13, 1937, pg. 12, reads: "The Smoketowner's a new club of Pittsburgh's finest young gentry tossed a real ritzy formal affair at the Loendi Club Parlors for the light-heavy champ, John Henry Lewis, and our camera-man was posted at the door and caught this interesting shot of 'Red' Bruce, one of Gus Greenlee's fighters and one of the charming Pittsburgh debutantes Miss Helen Douglas [Douglass] as they were entering. Frank Bolden, another Pgh. social idol appears to the right."
TitMainTitle: Boxer "Red" Bruce and Helen Douglass posed in Loendi Club with Frank Bolden in background
